name: Prowler 'PR-2' Gauntlets (unactive)
description: A form of PCE (proprietary cybernetic equipment), engineered by some of the more insane craftsmen of the Old Guard. Rigged specifically for the famous (or infamous) Snow-meow, these powered gauntlets attatch to the arms of any alloy-plated cyborg. When un-activated, they make a great shield but are heavy and unwieldy. Activate to power the unit and transform the weapon into its battery-powered bladed-form. A Personal UPS is recommended for operating this unit. [WARNING: It is not advised to utilize this equipment without Prowler 'PR-2' Gauntlets Support Frame.] [Hydraulic Muscles Required.]

use_action.msg: You hear a seering hiss as your Ravager MK II roars to life.
